title: Add RAJAT50 and MATHS30 discount codes

requirements.text: Add two new discount codes to the discount code validation logic in UpiPaymentStep.tsx: RAJAT50 (50% discount) and MATHS30 (30% discount). These must work alongside the existing SAVE10 (10%) and SUMMER20 (20%) codes.
acceptanceCriteria: Entering RAJAT50 in the discount code field applies a 50% discount to the booking total
Entering MATHS30 in the discount code field applies a 30% discount to the booking total
Existing codes SAVE10 (10%) and SUMMER20 (20%) continue to work correctly
Invalid codes still show an appropriate error message
The discounted final amount is correctly reflected in the payment summary and booking confirmation

requirements.text: Update the DiscountCodeManager admin UI to display RAJAT50 (50%) and MATHS30 (30%) alongside the existing discount codes so admins can see all active codes.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin discount codes panel lists RAJAT50 with 50% label
Admin discount codes panel lists MATHS30 with 30% label
All four codes (SAVE10, SUMMER20, RAJAT50, MATHS30) are visible in the admin view

constraints: Do not remove or modify existing discount codes SAVE10 (10%) and SUMMER20 (20%)
Discount code validation logic resides in frontend/src/components/UpiPaymentStep.tsx â€” update only that file's code list
nonGoals: Storing discount codes in the backend canister
Adding any new discount codes beyond RAJAT50 and MATHS30
Changing the discount application or pricing calculation logic
